title: Purple Ribbon All-Stars
text:
Purple Ribbon All-Stars was an American Southern hip hop supergroup under the Purple Ribbon Records (distributed  through Virgin Records) label. The group consisted of Big Boi, Killer Mike, Janelle Mon√°e, Sleepy Brown, Scar, Konkrete, BlackOwned C-Bone, Rock D, and Vonnegutt.


== Discography ==


=== Albums ===
Got That Purp (2004)
Got Purp? Vol. 2 (2005)
